CustomField.description: Displays as a multi-select in the CPL form but is a text field. Defaults to All Brands which searches for all brands, but if a user selects one or multiple then the query will only search for the selections. Filter selections available is both controlling and dynamic to all CBSS selections and Division.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Search All Brands within the agreement or search to filter the results.
CustomField.label: Brands
